name: alpine
description: A WordPress plugin that demonstrates how to easily add frontend interactivity with Alpinejs.
author: leeshadle

scripts.server:start: npx wp-env start && npm run cli:install-gutenberg && npm run cli:permalinks
scripts.server:clean: npx wp-env clean all && npm run server:stop && rm -rf node_modules wordpress
scripts.zip: npm run zip:mkdir && bestzip $npm_package_config_slug-$npm_package_version.zip ./$npm_package_config_slug/* && npm run zip:rmdir
scripts.cli:install-gutenberg: npx wp-env run cli wp plugin install gutenberg && npx wp-env run cli wp plugin activate gutenberg
scripts.cli:permalinks: npx wp-env run cli wp rewrite structure /%postname%/ --hard
scripts.server:setup: npm run setup && npm run server:start
scripts.zip:mkdir: mkdir $npm_package_config_slug && cp -r build includes vendor LICENSE readme.txt $npm_package_config_slug.php ./$npm_package_config_slug
